pitch.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
pitch.translation: Utilizzare per regolare se l'elicottero si sposta in una delle modalita' stabilizzate (angle, horizon, etc.).

roll.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
roll.translation: Utilizzare per regolare se l'elicottero si sposta in una delle modalita' stabilizzate (angle, horizon, etc.).

batteryCapacity.english: The milliamp hour capacity of your battery.
batteryCapacity.translation: La capacita' in milliampere ora della batteria.

batteryCellCount.english: The number of cells in your battery.
batteryCellCount.translation: Il numero di celle della batteria.

vbatfullcellvoltage.english: The nominal voltage of a fully charged cell.
vbatfullcellvoltage.translation: La tensione nominale di una cella completamente carica.

vbatmaxcellvoltage.english: The maximum voltage per cell before the high voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmaxcellvoltage.translation: La tensione massima per cella prima che scatti l'allarme di alta tensione.

vbatmincellvoltage.english: The minimum voltage per cell before the low voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmincellvoltage.translation: La tensione minima per cella prima che scatti l'allarme di bassa tensione.

vbatwarningcellvoltage.english: The voltage per cell at which the low voltage alarm will start to sound.
vbatwarningcellvoltage.translation: La tensione per cella alla quale l'allarme di bassa tensione iniziera' a suonare.

cell_count.english: Number of cells in the battery

current_gain.english: Gain value for the current sensor
current_gain.translation: Valore Guadagno per il sensore corrente

low_voltage_protection.english: Voltage at which we cut power by 50%
low_voltage_protection.translation: Voltaggio al quale si taglia potenza al 50%

response_speed.translation: Velocita' di Risposta per il motore

temperature_protection.english: Temperature at which we cut power by 50%
temperature_protection.translation: Temperatura alla quale taglio potenza al 50%

half_duplex.english: Half duplex mode for ESC telemetry
half_duplex.translation: Modo Half duplex per telemetria ESC

pin_swap.english: Swap the TX and RX pins for the ESC telemetry
pin_swap.translation: Scambia i pin della TX e RX per telemetria ESC

dyn_notch_max_hz.english: Maximum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_max_hz.translation: Frequenza massima a cui e' applicata il notch.

dyn_notch_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_min_hz.translation: Frequenza minima a cui e' applicato il notch.

dyn_notch_q.english: Quality factor of the notch filter.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.english: Dynamic filter max cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.translation: Filtro dinamico taglio massimo in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.english: Dynamic filter min cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.translation: Taglio Minimo del Filtro Dinamico in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_static_hz.translation: Frequenza di taglio del filtro passa-basso in Hz.

gyro_lpf2_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf2_static_hz.translation: Frequenza di taglio del filtro passa-basso in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.translation: Ampiezza del filtro notch in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.translation: Larghezza del filtro notch in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.translation: Frequenza centrale a cui e' applicato il notch.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.translation: Frequenza centrale a cui e' applicato il notch.

rpm_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency for the RPM filter.
rpm_min_hz.translation: Frequenza minima per il filtro RPM.

gov_handover_throttle.english: Governor activates above this %. Below this the input throttle is passed to the ESC.
gov_handover_throttle.translation: Il governor si attiva al di sopra di %. Al di sotto di questa, il gas viene passato all'ESC.

gov_recovery_time.english: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_recovery_time.translation: Costante di tempo per il recupero della velocita' di rotazione, in secondi, misurando il tempo da zero alla massima velocita'.

gov_spoolup_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle to use for slow spoolup, in percent. For electric motors the default is 5%, for nitro this should be set so the clutch starts to engage for a smooth spoolup 10-15%.
gov_spoolup_min_throttle.translation: Acceleratore minimo per un avvio lento, in percentuale. Per i motori elettrici il valore e' 5%, per i nitro andrebbe impostato in modo che la frizione innesti gradualmente al 10-15%.

gov_spoolup_time.english: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_spoolup_time.translation: Costante di tempo per avviamento lento, in secondi, che misura il tempo da zero alla massima velocita' di rotazione.

gov_startup_time.english: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_startup_time.translation: Costante di tempo per l'avvio lento, in secondi, che misura il tempo da zero alla massima velocita' della Rotore.

gov_tracking_time.english: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_tracking_time.translation: Costante di tempo per le variazioni di velocita' della Rotore, in secondi, che misura il tempo da zero alla massima velocita' della Rotore.

governor_collective_ff_weight.english: Collective precompensation weight - how much collective is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_collective_ff_weight.translation: Valore Precompensazione Collettivo - quanto collettivo e' mixato nel feedforward.

governor_cyclic_ff_weight.english: Cyclic precompensation weight - how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_cyclic_ff_weight.translation: Valore Precompensazione Ciclico - quanto ciclico e' mixato nel feedforward.

governor_headspeed.english: Target headspeed for the current profile.
governor_headspeed.translation: Velocita' Target Rotore per il profilo corrente.

governor_max_throttle.english: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

governor_min_throttle.english: Minimum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

governor_tta_gain.english: TTA gain applied to increase headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. motorised tail less than idle speed).
governor_tta_gain.translation: Guadagno TTA applicato per aumentare la velocita' del rotore per controllare la coda nelle direzioni negative (es: coda piu' lenta del minimo).

governor_tta_limit.english: TTA max headspeed increase over full headspeed.
governor_tta_limit.translation: Aumento Velocita' TTA max oltre la velocita massima rotore.

governor_yaw_ff_weight.english: Yaw precompensation weight - how much yaw is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_yaw_ff_weight.translation: Valore Precompensazione Yaw - Quanto yaw e' mixato nel feedforward.

collective_tilt_correction_neg.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for negative collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_neg.translation: Regolare la scala di correzione dell'inclinazione collettiva per il passo collettivo negativo.

collective_tilt_correction_pos.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for positive collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_pos.translation: Regolare la scala di correzione dell'inclinazione collettiva per il passo collettivo positivo.

swash_geo_correction.english: Adjust if there is too much negative collective or too much positive collective.
swash_geo_correction.translation: Regolare se c'e' troppo negativo o troppo positivo nel collettivo.

swash_phase.english: Phase offset for the swashplate controls.
swash_phase.translation: Offset di Fase per controlli piatto oscillante.

swash_pitch_limit.english: Maximum amount of combined cyclic and collective blade pitch.
swash_pitch_limit.translation: Massima quantita' di passo ciclico e collettivo combinato delle pale.

swash_trim_0.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_0.translation: Regolazione del piatto oscillante per livellare il piatto quando si utilizzano collegamenti fissi.

swash_trim_1.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_1.translation: Regolazione del piatto oscillante per livellare il piatto quando si utilizzano collegamenti fissi.

swash_trim_2.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_2.translation: Regolazione del piatto oscillante per livellare il piatto quando si utilizzano collegamenti fissi.

tail_center_trim.english: Sets tail rotor trim for 0 yaw for variable pitch, or tail motor throttle for 0 yaw for motorized.
tail_center_trim.translation: Imposta il trim del rotore di coda per yaw 0 per passo variabile, o l'acceleratore del motore di coda per Yaw 0 per motorizzato.

tail_motor_idle.english: Minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop.
tail_motor_idle.translation: Segnale minimo di accelerazione inviato al motore di coda. Questo dovrebbe essere impostato appena abbastanza alto da non far fermare il motore.

maxthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at full throttle
maxthrottle.translation: Questo valore PWM viene inviato all'ESC/servo a massima accelerazione

mincommand.english: This PWM value is sent when the motor is stopped
mincommand.translation: Questo valore PWM viene inviato quando il motore e' fermo

minthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at low throttle
minthrottle.translation: Questo valore PWM viene inviato all'ESC/servo a bassa accelerazione

motor_pole_count_0.english: The number of magnets on the motor bell.
motor_pole_count_0.translation: Il numero di magneti nella campana motore.

motor_pwm_protocol.english: The protocol used to communicate with the ESC
motor_pwm_protocol.translation: Il protocollo utilizzato per comunicare con l'ESC

motor_pwm_rate.english: The frequency at which the ESC sends PWM signals to the motor
motor_pwm_rate.translation: La frequenza con cui l'ESC invia segnali PWM al motore

angle_level_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Angle mode.
angle_level_limit.translation: Limita l'angolo massimo di beccheggio/rollio dell'elicottero mentre e' in modalita' Angle.

angle_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Angle Mode.
angle_level_strength.translation: Determina l'aggressivita' con cui l'elicottero si inclina all'indietro per tornare in piano mentre e' in modalita' angle.

cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for the compensation. Higher value will make the compensation action faster.
cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.translation: Limite di frequenza per la compensazione. Un valore piu' alto rendera' piu' rapida l'azione di compensazione.

cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.english: Amount of compensation applied for pitch-to-roll decoupling.
cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.translation: Quantita' di compensazione applicata per il disaccoppiamento passo-rollio.

cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.english: Amount of roll-to-pitch compensation needed, vs. pitch-to-roll.
cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.translation: Quantita' di compensazione del roll-to-pitch necessaria, vs. pitch-to-roll.

error_decay_limit_cyclic.english: Maximum bleed-off speed for cyclic I-term.
error_decay_limit_cyclic.translation: Velocita' massima di spurgo per I-term ciclico.

error_decay_time_cyclic.english: Time constant for bleeding off cyclic I-term. Higher will stabilize hover, lower will drift.
error_decay_time_cyclic.translation: Costante di tempo per lo spurgo dell' I-term ciclico. Piu' alto stabilizzera' il volo stazionario, piu' basso lo fara' andare alla deriva.

error_decay_time_ground.english: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne to stop the craft tipping over.
error_decay_time_ground.translation: Scarica l'errore del controller corrente quando l'aeromobile non e' in volo per evitare che si ribalti.

error_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_0.translation: Limite massimo per l'errore angolare nel loop PID. L'errore assoluto e quindi l' I-term non supereranno mai questi limiti.

error_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_1.translation: Limite massimo per l'errore angolare nel circuito PID. L'errore assoluto e quindi l' I-term I non superera' mai questi limiti.

error_limit_2.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_2.translation: Limite massimo per l'errore angolare nel circuito PID. L'errore assoluto e quindi l' I-term I non superera' mai questi limiti.

error_rotation.english: Rotates the current roll and pitch error terms around yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.
error_rotation.translation: Ruota i termini di errore di rollio e beccheggio attuali attorno all'imbardata quando l'aeromobile ruota. Questo e' talvolta chiamato Compensazione Piro.

gyro_cutoff_0.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_0.translation: Loop PID larghezza di banda complessiva in Hz.”

gyro_cutoff_1.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_1.translation: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.

gyro_cutoff_2.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_2.translation: Larghezza di banda complessiva del loop PID in Hz.

horizon_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Horizon Mode.
horizon_level_strength.translation: Determina l'aggressivita' con cui l'elicottero si inclina all'indietro per tornare in piano mentre e' in modalita' Horizon.

iterm_relax_cutoff_0.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_0.translation: Aiuta a ridurre il rimbalzo dopo movimenti rapidi del joystick. Se troppo basso, puo' causare incoerenza nei piccoli movimenti del joystick.

iterm_relax_cutoff_1.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_1.translation: Aiuta a ridurre il rimbalzo dopo movimenti rapidi del joystick. Se troppo basso, puo' causare incoerenza nei piccoli movimenti del joystick.

iterm_relax_cutoff_2.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_2.translation: Aiuta a ridurre il rimbalzo dopo movimenti rapidi del joystick. Se troppo basso, puo' causare incoerenza nei piccoli movimenti del joystick.

iterm_relax_type.english: Choose the axes in which this is active. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.
iterm_relax_type.translation: Scegli gli assi in cui e' attivo. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.

offset_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_0.translation: Limite massimo per l'angolo di offset integrale ad alta velocita' nel loop PID. O-term non superera' mai questi limiti.

offset_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_1.translation: Limite massimo per l'angolo di offset integrale ad alta velocita' nel ciclo PID. L' O-term non superera' mai questi limiti.

pitch_collective_ff_gain.english: Increasing will compensate for the pitching up motion caused by tail drag when climbing.
pitch_collective_ff_gain.translation: L'aumento compensera' il movimento di beccheggio causato dal trascinamento della coda durante la salita.

trainer_angle_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_angle_limit.translation: Limitare l'angolo massimo di beccheggio/rollio dell'elicottero in modalita' Acro Trainer.

trainer_gain.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_gain.translation: Determina l'aggressivita' con cui l'elicottero si inclina all'indietro fino all'angolo massimo (se superato) mentre e' in modalita' Acro Trainer.

yaw_ccw_stop_gain.translation: Guadagno di Stop (PD) per rotazione antioraria.

yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.english: Decay time for the extra yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.translation: Tempo di decadimento per il precomp di imbardata extra sull'input collettivo.

yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.english: An extra boost of yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.translation: Un impulso extra di precomando imbardata sull'ingresso collettivo.

yaw_collective_ff_gain.english: Collective feedforward mixed into yaw (collective-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_collective_ff_gain.translation: Feedforward Collettivo mixato in yaw (collective-to-yaw precomp).

yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.english: Cyclic feedforward mixed into yaw (cyclic-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.translation: Feedforward ciclico mixato nello yaw (cyclic-to-yaw precomp).

yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.english: Cutoff. Derivative cutoff frequency in 1/10Hz steps. Controls how sharp the precomp is. Higher value is sharper.
yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.translation: Cutoff. Frequenza Cutoff Derivativa in passi da 1/10Hz. Controlla quanto preciso e' il precomp. Valori Alti maggior precisione.

yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.english: Scalar gain. The strength of the main rotor inertia. Higher value means more precomp is applied to yaw control.
yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.translation: Guadagno scalare. La forza dell'inerzia del rotore principale. Un valore piu' alto significa che viene applicato piu' precomp al controllo di imbardata.

yaw_precomp_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.
yaw_precomp_cutoff.translation: Limite di Frequenza di tutte le compensazioni di Yaw.

pid_0_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_0_B.translation: Aumento dell'anticipo per far reagire maggiormente l'elicottero ai rapidi movimenti del joystick.

pid_0_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_0_D.translation: Forza di smorzamento di qualsiasi movimento sul sistema, incluse le influenze esterne. Riduce anche l'overshoot.

pid_0_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_0_F.translation: Aiuta a spingere il P-term in base all'input del joystick. Aumentando si rende la risposta piu' netta, ma puo' causare un overshoot.

pid_0_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_0_I.translation: Quanto il sistema mantiene la sua posizione.

pid_0_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from rolling when using high collective.
pid_0_O.translation: Utilizzato per evitare che il velivolo si rovesci quando si usa il collettivo alto.

pid_0_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_0_P.translation: Quanto strettamente il sistema segue il setpoint desiderato.

pid_1_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_1_B.translation: Aumento dell'anticipo per far reagire maggiormente l'elicottero ai rapidi movimenti del joystick.

pid_1_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_1_D.translation: Forza di smorzamento di qualsiasi movimento sul sistema, incluse le influenze esterne. Riduce anche l'overshoot.

pid_1_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_1_F.translation: Aiuta a spingere il P-term in base all'input del joystick. Aumentando si rende la risposta piu' netta, ma puo' causare un overshoot.

pid_1_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_1_I.translation: Quanto il sistema mantiene la sua posizione.

pid_1_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from pitching when using high collective.
pid_1_O.translation: Utilizzato per evitare che il velivolo beccheggi quando si usa il collettivo alto.

pid_1_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_1_P.translation: Quanto strettamente il sistema segue il setpoint desiderato.

pid_2_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_2_B.translation: Aumento dell'anticipo per far reagire maggiormente l'elicottero ai rapidi movimenti del joystick.

pid_2_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_2_D.translation: Forza di smorzamento di qualsiasi movimento sul sistema, incluse le influenze esterne. Riduce anche l'overshoot.

pid_2_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_2_F.translation: Aiuta a spingere il P-term in base all'input del joystick. Aumentando si rende la risposta piu' netta, ma puo' causare un overshoot.

pid_2_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_2_I.translation: Quanto il sistema mantiene la sua posizione.

pid_2_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_2_P.translation: Quanto strettamente il sistema segue il setpoint desiderato.

model_flight_time.english: Set this to the expected flight time in seconds.  The transmitter will beep when the flight time is reached.
model_flight_time.translation: Set this to the expected flight time in seconds.  The transmitter will beep when the flight time is reached.

rc_arm_throttle.english: Throttle must be at or below this value in microseconds (us) to allow arming. Must be at least 10us lower than minimum throttle.
rc_arm_throttle.translation: L'acceleratore deve essere a questo valore o inferiore in microsecondi (us) per consentire l'inserimento. Deve essere almeno 10 us inferiore all'acceleratore minimo.

rc_deadband.english: Deadband for cyclic control in microseconds (us).
rc_deadband.translation: Deadband per il controllo ciclico in microsecondi (us).

rc_deflection.english: Stick deflection from center in microseconds (us).
rc_deflection.translation: Deflessione dello stick dal centro in microsecondi (us).

rc_max_throttle.english: Maximum throttle (100% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_max_throttle.translation: Accelerazione massima (0% di potenza di accelerazione) prevista dalla radio, in microsecondi (us).

rc_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle (0% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_min_throttle.translation: Accelerazione minima (0% di potenza di accelerazione) prevista dalla radio, in microsecondi (us).

rc_yaw_deadband.english: Deadband for yaw control in microseconds (us).
rc_yaw_deadband.translation: Deadband per il controllo dell'imbardata in microsecondi (us).

accel_limit_1.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_1.translation: Accelerazione Massima del velivolo in risposta al movimento stick.

accel_limit_2.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_2.translation: Accelerazione Massima del velivolo in risposta al movimento stick.

accel_limit_3.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_3.translation: Accelerazione Massima del velivolo in risposta al movimento stick.

accel_limit_4.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_4.translation: Accelerazione Massima del velivolo in risposta al movimento stick.

response_time_1.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_1.translation: Aumenta o diminuisce il tempo di risposta dei rate per addolcire movimenti heli.

response_time_2.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_2.translation: Aumenta o diminuisce il tempo di risposta dei rate per addolcire movimenti heli.

response_time_3.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_3.translation: Aumenta o diminuisce il tempo di risposta dei rate per addolcire movimenti heli.

response_time_4.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_4.translation: Aumenta o diminuisce il tempo di risposta dei rate per addolcire movimenti heli.

yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic ceiling.
yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.translation: Guadagno massimo applicato alla soglia dinamica dello yaw.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.english: The maximum filter applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.translation: Filtro massimo applicato alla deadband dinamica dello yaw.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.translation: Massimo guadagno applicato alla deadband dinamica dello yaw.

rescue_climb_collective.translation: Valore Collettivo per l'ascesa di salvataggio.

rescue_climb_time.english: Length of time the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.
rescue_climb_time.translation: Durata del tempo di ascesa collettivo prima di passare ad hover.

rescue_exit_time.english: This limits rapid application of negative collective if the helicopter has rolled during rescue.
rescue_exit_time.translation: Questi limiti di applicazione di collettivo negativo se l'elicottero ha rollato durante salvataggio.

rescue_flip_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli flips during inverted rescue.
rescue_flip_gain.translation: Determina aggresivita' del flip del heli nel salvataggio rovescio.

rescue_flip_mode.english: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted.
rescue_flip_mode.translation: Se Salvataggio viene attivato in volo rovescio, flip a volo dritto - o rimane invertito.

rescue_flip_time.english: If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not within this time, rescue will be aborted.
rescue_flip_time.translation: Se l'hely e' in modo salvataggio e sta provando un flip dritto e non esegue in questo tempo, il salvataggio viene annullato.

rescue_level_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli levels during rescue.
rescue_level_gain.translation: Determina aggressivita' del livellamento nel salvataggio.

rescue_max_setpoint_accel.english: Limit how fast the helicopter accelerates into a roll/pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.
rescue_max_setpoint_accel.translation: Limite di quanto veloce l'elicottero accelera in un roll/pitch. Elicotteri grandi necessitano di accelarioni lente.

rescue_max_setpoint_rate.english: Limit rescue roll/pitch rate. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.
rescue_max_setpoint_rate.translation: Limite rateo salvataggio roll/pitch. Elicotteri grandi usano ratei piu lenti di rotazione.

rescue_pull_up_time.english: When rescue is activated, helicopter will apply pull-up collective for this time period before moving to flip or climb stage.
rescue_pull_up_time.translation: Quando salvataggio attivato, l'elicottero applica un pull-up collettivo per questo periodo di tempo prima di eseguire flip o fase di ascesa.

btn_cancel.translation: Configure the motor and speed controller features.

check_bg_task.translation: Abilita i Task Background per favore.

check_discovered_sensors.english: Please check you have discovered all sensors.
check_discovered_sensors.translation: Assicurati di aver trovato tutti i sensori.

check_heli_on.english: Please check your heli is powered up and radio connected.
check_heli_on.translation: Assicurati che la radiosia connessa e l'elicottero sia acceso.

check_msp_version.english: Unable to determine MSP version in use.
check_msp_version.translation: Impossibile determinare la MSP in uso.

check_rf_module_on.english: Please check your rf module is turned on.
check_rf_module_on.translation: Prego accertarsi di aver acceso il modulo rf.

check_supported_version.english:
This version of the Lua script 
can't be used with the selected model
check_supported_version.translation:
Questa Versione del Lua Script 
non puo' essere usata con il modello selezionato

credits.english: Notable contributors to both the neurondash firmware and this software are: Petri Mattila, Egon Lubbers, Rob Thomson, Rob Gayle, Phil Kaighin, Robert Burrow, Keith Williams, Bertrand Songis, Venbs Zhou... and many more who have spent hours testing and providing feedback!
credits.translation: Notable contributors to both the neurondash firmware and this software are: Petri Mattila, Egon Lubbers, Rob Thomson, Rob Gayle, Phil Kaighin, Robert Burrow, Keith Williams, Bertrand Songis, Venbs Zhou... and many more who have spent hours testing and providing feedback!

help_p1.english: This page provides some useful information that you may be asked for when requesting support.
help_p1.translation: This page provides some useful information that you may be asked for when requesting support.

help_p2.english: For support, please first read the help pages on www.rotorflight.org
help_p2.translation: For support, please first read the help pages on www.rotorflight.org

license.english: You may copy, distribute, and modify the software as long as you track changes/dates in source files. Any modifications to or software including (via compiler) GPL-licensed code must also be made available under the GPL along with build & install instructions.
license.translation: You may copy, distribute, and modify the software as long as you track changes/dates in source files. Any modifications to or software including (via compiler) GPL-licensed code must also be made available under the GPL along with build & install instructions.

opener.english: neurondash is an open source project. Contribution from other like minded people, keen to assist in making this software even better, is welcomed and encouraged. You do not have to be a hardcore programmer to help.
opener.translation: neurondash is an open source project. Contribution from other like minded people, keen to assist in making this software even better, is welcomed and encouraged. You do not have to be a hardcore programmer to help.

help_p1.english: The accelerometer is used to measure the angle of the flight controller in relation to the horizon. This data is used to stabilize the aircraft and provide self-leveling functionality.
help_p1.translation: The accelerometer is used to measure the angle of the flight controller in relation to the horizon. This data is used to stabilize the aircraft and provide self-leveling functionality.

help_p1.english: The battery settings are used to configure the flight controller to monitor the battery voltage and provide warnings when the voltage drops below a certain level.
help_p1.translation: The battery settings are used to configure the flight controller to monitor the battery voltage and provide warnings when the voltage drops below a certain level.

help_p1.english: Copy PID profile or Rate profile from Source to Destination.
help_p1.translation: Copy PID profile or Rate profile from Source to Destination.

help_p2.english: Choose the source and destinations and save to copy the profile.
help_p2.translation: Choose the source and destinations and save to copy the profile.

msgbox_msg.english: Save current page to flight controller?
msgbox_msg.translation: Save current page to flight controller?

help_p1.english: Configure the motor and speed controller features.
help_p1.translation: Configure the motor and speed controller features.

extra_msg_save.english: Please reboot the ESC to apply the changes
extra_msg_save.translation: Please reboot the ESC to apply the changes

help_p1.english: Typically you would not edit this page without checking your Blackbox logs!
help_p1.translation: Typically you would not edit this page without checking your Blackbox logs!

help_p2.english: Gyro lowpass: Lowpass filters for the gyro signal. Typically left at default.
help_p2.translation: Gyro lowpass: Lowpass filters for the gyro signal. Typically left at default.

help_p3.english: Gyro notch filters: Use for filtering specific frequency ranges. Typically not needed in most helis.
help_p3.translation: Gyro notch filters: Use for filtering specific frequency ranges. Typically not needed in most helis.

help_p4.english: Dynamic Notch Filters: Automatically creates notch filters within the min and max frequency range.
help_p4.translation: Dynamic Notch Filters: Automatically creates notch filters within the min and max frequency range.

help_p1.english: These parameters apply globally to the governor regardless of the profile in use.
help_p1.translation: These parameters apply globally to the governor regardless of the profile in use.

help_p2.english: Each parameter is simply a time value in seconds for each governor action.
help_p2.translation: Each parameter is simply a time value in seconds for each governor action.

help_logs_p1.english: Please select a log file from the list below.
help_logs_p1.translation: Please select a log file from the list below.

help_logs_p2.english: Note. To enable logging it is essential for you to have the following sensors enabled.
help_logs_p2.translation: Note. To enable logging it is essential for you to have the following sensors enabled.

help_logs_p3.english: - arm status, voltage, headspeed, current, esc temperature
help_logs_p3.translation: - arm status, voltage, headspeed, current, esc temperature

help_logs_tool_p1.english: Please use the slider to navigate the graph.
help_logs_tool_p1.translation: Please use the slider to navigate the graph.

help_p1.english: Adust swash plate geometry, phase angles, and limits.
help_p1.translation: Adust swash plate geometry, phase angles, and limits.

help_p1.english: This tool provides the ability to send a custom byte string to the flight controller. It is useful for developers when debugging values.
help_p1.translation: This tool provides the ability to send a custom byte string to the flight controller. It is useful for developers when debugging values.

help_p2.english: If you do not understand what you are doing, do not use it as bad things can happen.
help_p2.translation: If you do not understand what you are doing, do not use it as bad things can happen.

help_p1.english: This tool attempts to determine the quality of your MSP data link by performing as many large MSP queries within 30 seconds as possible.
help_p1.translation: This tool attempts to determine the quality of your MSP data link by performing as many large MSP queries within 30 seconds as possible.

start_prompt.english: Would you like to start the test? Choose the test run time below.
start_prompt.translation: Would you like to start the test? Choose the test run time below.

help_p1.english: FeedForward (Roll/Pitch): Start at 70, increase until stops are sharp with no drift. Keep roll and pitch equal.
help_p1.translation: FeedForward (Roll/Pitch): Start at 70, increase until stops are sharp with no drift. Keep roll and pitch equal.

help_p2.english: I Gain (Roll/Pitch): Raise gradually for stable piro pitch pumps. Too high causes wobbles; match roll/pitch values.
help_p2.translation: I Gain (Roll/Pitch): Raise gradually for stable piro pitch pumps. Too high causes wobbles; match roll/pitch values.

help_p3.english: Tail P/I/D Gains: Increase P until slight wobble in funnels, then back off slightly. Raise I until tail holds firm in hard moves (too high causes slow wag). Adjust D for smooth stops—higher for slow servos, lower for fast ones.
help_p3.translation: Tail P/I/D Gains: Increase P until slight wobble in funnels, then back off slightly. Raise I until tail holds firm in hard moves (too high causes slow wag). Adjust D for smooth stops—higher for slow servos, lower for fast ones.

help_p4.english: Tail Stop Gain (CW/CCW): Adjust separately for clean, bounce-free stops in both directions.
help_p4.translation: Tail Stop Gain (CW/CCW): Adjust separately for clean, bounce-free stops in both directions.

help_p5.english: Test & Adjust: Fly, observe, and fine-tune for best performance in real conditions.
help_p5.translation: Test & Adjust: Fly, observe, and fine-tune for best performance in real conditions.

help_p1.english: Acro Trainer: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Acro Trainer Mode.
help_p1.translation: Acro Trainer: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Acro Trainer Mode.

help_p2.english: Angle Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Angle Mode.
help_p2.translation: Angle Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Angle Mode.

help_p3.english: Horizon Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Horizon Mode.
help_p3.translation: Horizon Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Horizon Mode.

help_p1.english: Full headspeed: Headspeed target when at 100% throttle input.
help_p1.translation: Full headspeed: Headspeed target when at 100% throttle input.

help_p2.english: PID master gain: How hard the governor works to hold the RPM.
help_p2.translation: PID master gain: How hard the governor works to hold the RPM.

help_p3.english: Gains: Fine tuning of the governor.
help_p3.translation: Gains: Fine tuning of the governor.

help_p4.english: Precomp: Governor precomp gain for yaw, cyclic, and collective inputs.
help_p4.translation: Precomp: Governor precomp gain for yaw, cyclic, and collective inputs.

help_p5.english: Max throttle: The maximum throttle % the governor is allowed to use.
help_p5.translation: Max throttle: The maximum throttle % the governor is allowed to use.

help_p6.english: Tail Torque Assist: For motorized tails. Gain and limit of headspeed increase when using main rotor torque for yaw assist.
help_p6.translation: Tail Torque Assist: For motorized tails. Gain and limit of headspeed increase when using main rotor torque for yaw assist.

help_p1.english: Collective Pitch Compensation: Increasing will compensate for the pitching motion caused by tail drag when climbing.
help_p1.translation: Collective Pitch Compensation: Increasing will compensate for the pitching motion caused by tail drag when climbing.

help_p2.english: Cross Coupling Gain: Removes roll coupling when only elevator is applied.
help_p2.translation: Cross Coupling Gain: Removes roll coupling when only elevator is applied.

help_p3.english: Cross Coupling Ratio: Amount of compensation (pitch vs roll) to apply.
help_p3.translation: Cross Coupling Ratio: Amount of compensation (pitch vs roll) to apply.

help_p4.english: Cross Coupling Freq. Limit: Frequency limit for the compensation, higher value will make the compensation action faster.
help_p4.translation: Cross Coupling Freq. Limit: Frequency limit for the compensation, higher value will make the compensation action faster.

help_p1.english: PID Bandwidth: Overall bandwidth in HZ used by the PID loop.
help_p1.translation: PID Bandwidth: Overall bandwidth in HZ used by the PID loop.

help_p2.english: D-term cutoff: D-term cutoff frequency in HZ.
help_p2.translation: D-term cutoff: D-term cutoff frequency in HZ.

help_p3.english: B-term cutoff: B-term cutoff frequency in HZ.
help_p3.translation: B-term cutoff: B-term cutoff frequency in HZ.

help_p1.english: Error decay ground: PID decay to help prevent heli from tipping over when on the ground.
help_p1.translation: Error decay ground: PID decay to help prevent heli from tipping over when on the ground.

help_p2.english: Error limit: Angle limit for I-term.
help_p2.translation: Error limit: Angle limit for I-term.

help_p3.english: Offset limit: Angle limit for High Speed Integral (O-term).
help_p3.translation: Offset limit: Angle limit for High Speed Integral (O-term).

help_p4.english: Error rotation: Allow errors to be shared between all axes.
help_p4.translation: Error rotation: Allow errors to be shared between all axes.

help_p5.english: I-term relax: Limit accumulation of I-term during fast movements - helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Generally needs to be lower for large helis and can be higher for small helis. Best to only reduce as much as is needed for your flying style.
help_p5.translation: I-term relax: Limit accumulation of I-term during fast movements - helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Generally needs to be lower for large helis and can be higher for small helis. Best to only reduce as much as is needed for your flying style.

help_p1.english: Flip to upright: Flip the heli upright when rescue is activated.
help_p1.translation: Flip to upright: Flip the heli upright when rescue is activated.

help_p2.english: Pull-up: How much collective and for how long to arrest the fall.
help_p2.translation: Pull-up: How much collective and for how long to arrest the fall.

help_p3.english: Climb: How much collective to maintain a steady climb - and how long.
help_p3.translation: Climb: How much collective to maintain a steady climb - and how long.

help_p4.english: Hover: How much collective to maintain a steady hover.
help_p4.translation: Hover: How much collective to maintain a steady hover.

help_p5.english: Flip: How long to wait before aborting because the flip did not work.
help_p5.translation: Flip: How long to wait before aborting because the flip did not work.

help_p6.english: Gains: How hard to fight to keep heli level when engaging rescue mode.
help_p6.translation: Gains: How hard to fight to keep heli level when engaging rescue mode.

help_p7.english: Rate and Accel: Max rotation and acceleration rates when leveling during rescue.
help_p7.translation: Rate and Accel: Max rotation and acceleration rates when leveling during rescue.

help_p1.english: Set the current flight profile or rate profile you would like to use.
help_p1.translation: Set the current flight profile or rate profile you would like to use.

help_p2.english: If you use a switch on your radio to change flight or rate modes, this will override this choice as soon as you toggle the switch.
help_p2.translation: If you use a switch on your radio to change flight or rate modes, this will override this choice as soon as you toggle the switch.

save_prompt.english: Save current page to flight controller?
save_prompt.translation: Save current page to flight controller?

help_p1.english: Yaw Stop Gain: Higher stop gain will make the tail stop more aggressively but may cause oscillations if too high. Adjust CW or CCW to make the yaw stops even.
help_p1.translation: Yaw Stop Gain: Higher stop gain will make the tail stop more aggressively but may cause oscillations if too high. Adjust CW or CCW to make the yaw stops even.

help_p2.english: Precomp Cutoff: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.
help_p2.translation: Precomp Cutoff: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.

help_p3.english: Cyclic FF Gain: Tail precompensation for cyclic inputs.
help_p3.translation: Cyclic FF Gain: Tail precompensation for cyclic inputs.

help_p4.english: Collective FF Gain: Tail precompensation for collective inputs.
help_p4.translation: Collective FF Gain: Tail precompensation for collective inputs.

help_p5.english: Collective Impulse FF: Impulse tail precompensation for collective inputs. If you need extra tail precompensation at the beginning of collective input.
help_p5.translation: Collective Impulse FF: Impulse tail precompensation for collective inputs. If you need extra tail precompensation at the beginning of collective input.

help_p1.english: Configure your radio settings. Stick center, arm, throttle hold, and throttle cut.
help_p1.translation: Configure your radio settings. Stick center, arm, throttle hold, and throttle cut.

help_default_p1.english: Default: We keep this to make button appear for rates.
help_default_p1.translation: Default: We keep this to make button appear for rates.

help_default_p2.english: We will use the sub keys below.
help_default_p2.translation: We will use the sub keys below.

help_table_0_p1.english: All values are set to zero because no RATE TABLE is in use.
help_table_0_p1.translation: All values are set to zero because no RATE TABLE is in use.

help_table_1_p1.english: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.
help_table_1_p1.translation: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.

help_table_1_p2.english: SuperRate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_1_p2.translation: SuperRate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.

help_table_1_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_1_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_2_p1.english: Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_2_p1.translation: Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.

help_table_2_p2.english: Acro+: Increases the maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_2_p2.translation: Acro+: Increases the maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.

help_table_2_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_2_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_3_p1.english: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.
help_table_3_p1.translation: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.

help_table_3_p2.english: Rate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_3_p2.translation: Rate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.

help_table_3_p3.english: RC Curve: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_3_p3.translation: RC Curve: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_4_p1.english: Center Sensitivity: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. Set Center Sensitivity to the same as Max Rate for a linear response. A lower number than Max Rate will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Note that higher than Max Rate will increase the Max Rate - not recommended as it causes issues in the Blackbox log.
help_table_4_p1.translation: Center Sensitivity: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. Set Center Sensitivity to the same as Max Rate for a linear response. A lower number than Max Rate will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Note that higher than Max Rate will increase the Max Rate - not recommended as it causes issues in the Blackbox log.

help_table_4_p2.english: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_4_p2.translation: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.

help_table_4_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_4_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_5_p1.english: RC Rate: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. RC Rate set to one half of the Max Rate is linear. A lower number will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Higher than one half of the Max Rate will also increase the Max Rate.
help_table_5_p1.translation: RC Rate: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. RC Rate set to one half of the Max Rate is linear. A lower number will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Higher than one half of the Max Rate will also increase the Max Rate.

help_table_5_p2.english: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_5_p2.translation: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.

help_table_5_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_5_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_p1.english: Rates type: Choose the rate type you prefer flying with. Raceflight and Actual are the most straightforward.
help_p1.translation: Rates type: Choose the rate type you prefer flying with. Raceflight and Actual are the most straightforward.

help_p2.english: Dynamics: Applied regardless of rates type. Typically left on defaults but can be adjusted to smooth heli movements, like with scale helis.
help_p2.translation: Dynamics: Applied regardless of rates type. Typically left on defaults but can be adjusted to smooth heli movements, like with scale helis.

help_rate_table.english: Please select the rate you would like to use. Saving will apply the choice to the active profile.
help_rate_table.translation: Please select the rate you would like to use. Saving will apply the choice to the active profile.

msg_reset_to_defaults.english: Rate type changed. Values will be reset to defaults.
msg_reset_to_defaults.translation: Rate type changed. Values will be reset to defaults.

help_default_p1.english: Configure advanced mixing and channel mapping if you have SBUS Out enabled on a serial port.
help_default_p1.translation: Configure advanced mixing and channel mapping if you have SBUS Out enabled on a serial port.

help_default_p2.english: - For RX channels or servos (wideband), use 1000, 2000 or 500,1000 for narrow band servos.
help_default_p2.translation: - For RX channels or servos (wideband), use 1000, 2000 or 500,1000 for narrow band servos.

help_default_p5.english: - Or you can customize your own mapping.
help_default_p5.translation: - Or you can customize your own mapping.

help_fields_max.english: The maximum pwm value to send
help_fields_max.translation: The maximum pwm value to send

help_fields_min.english: The minimum pwm value to send.
help_fields_min.translation: The minimum pwm value to send.

help_fields_source.english: Source id for the mix, counting from 0-15.
help_fields_source.translation: Source id for the mix, counting from 0-15.

save_prompt.english: Save current page to flight controller?
save_prompt.translation: Save current page to flight controller?

disable_servo_override_msg.english: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.
disable_servo_override_msg.translation: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.

enable_servo_override_msg.english: Servo override allows you to 'trim' your servo center point in real time.
enable_servo_override_msg.translation: Servo override allows you to 'trim' your servo center point in real time.

help_default_p1.english: Please select the servo you would like to configure from the list below.
help_default_p1.translation: Please select the servo you would like to configure from the list below.

help_default_p2.english: Primary flight controls that use the rotorflight mixer will display in the section called 'mixer'.
help_default_p2.translation: Primary flight controls that use the rotorflight mixer will display in the section called 'mixer'.

help_default_p3.english: Any other servos that are not controlled by the primary flight mixer will be displayed in the section called 'Other servos'.
help_default_p3.translation: Any other servos that are not controlled by the primary flight mixer will be displayed in the section called 'Other servos'.

help_fields_flags.english: 0 = Default, 1=Reverse, 2 = Geo Correction, 3 = Reverse + Geo Correction
help_fields_flags.translation: 0 = Default, 1=Reverse, 2 = Geo Correction, 3 = Reverse + Geo Correction

help_tool_p1.english: Override: [*] Enable override to allow real-time updates of servo center point.
help_tool_p1.translation: Override: [*] Enable override to allow real-time updates of servo center point.

help_tool_p2.english: Center: Adjust the center position of the servo.
help_tool_p2.translation: Center: Adjust the center position of the servo.

help_tool_p3.english: Minimum/Maximum: Adjust the end points of the selected servo.
help_tool_p3.translation: Minimum/Maximum: Adjust the end points of the selected servo.

help_tool_p4.english: Scale: Adjust the amount the servo moves for a given input.
help_tool_p4.translation: Scale: Adjust the amount the servo moves for a given input.

help_tool_p5.english: Rate: The frequency the servo runs best at - check with manufacturer.
help_tool_p5.translation: Rate: The frequency the servo runs best at - check with manufacturer.

help_tool_p6.english: Speed: The speed the servo moves. Generally only used for the cyclic servos to help the swash move evenly. Optional - leave all at 0 if unsure.
help_tool_p6.translation: Speed: The speed the servo moves. Generally only used for the cyclic servos to help the swash move evenly. Optional - leave all at 0 if unsure.

no_themes_available_to_configure.english: No configurable themes installed on this device
no_themes_available_to_configure.translation: No configurable themes installed on this device

erase_prompt.english: Would you like to erase the dataflash?
erase_prompt.translation: Would you like to erase the dataflash?

help_p1.english: Use this page to view your current flight controller status. This can be useful when determining why your heli will not arm.
help_p1.translation: Use this page to view your current flight controller status. This can be useful when determining why your heli will not arm.

help_p2.english: To erase the dataflash for more log file storage, press the button on the menu denoted by a '*'.
help_p2.translation: To erase the dataflash for more log file storage, press the button on the menu denoted by a '*'.

disable_mixer_message.english: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.
disable_mixer_message.translation: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.

enable_mixer_message.english:
Set all servos to their configured center position. 

This will result in all values on this page being saved when adjusting the servo trim.
enable_mixer_message.translation:
Set all servos to their configured center position. 

This will result in all values on this page being saved when adjusting the servo trim.

help_p1.english: Link trims: Use to trim out small leveling issues in your swash plate. Typically only used if the swash links are non-adjustable.
help_p1.translation: Link trims: Use to trim out small leveling issues in your swash plate. Typically only used if the swash links are non-adjustable.

help_p2.english: Motorised tail: If using a motorised tail, use this to set the minimum idle speed and zero yaw.
help_p2.translation: Motorised tail: If using a motorised tail, use this to set the minimum idle speed and zero yaw.

help_p1.english: This tool attempts to list all the sensors that you are not receiving in a concise list.
help_p1.translation: This tool attempts to list all the sensors that you are not receiving in a concise list.

help_p2.english: Use this tool to ensure you are sending the correct sensors.
help_p2.translation: Use this tool to ensure you are sending the correct sensors.

msg_repair.english: Enable required sensors on flight controller?
msg_repair.translation: Enable required sensors on flight controller?

msg_repair_fin.english: The flight controller has been configured? You may need to perform a discover sensors to see the changes.
msg_repair_fin.translation: The flight controller has been configured? You may need to perform a discover sensors to see the changes.

msg_please_disarm_to_save_warning.english: Settings will only be saved to eeprom on disarm
msg_please_disarm_to_save_warning.translation: I Settaggi saranno salvati su eeprom al disarmo

msg_save_current_page.english: Save current page to flight controller?
